PolygonDrawMode: Type of polygon to draw in the viewport
bAllowSelfIntersections: Allow freehand drawn polygons to self-intersect
FeatureSizeRatio: Size of secondary features, e.g. the rounded corners of a rounded rectangle, as fraction of the overall shape size
RadialSlices: Number of radial subdivisions in round features, e.g. circles or rounded corners
bShowGridGizmo: If true, shows a gizmo to manipulate the additional grid used to draw the polygon on
ExtrudeMode: If and how the drawn polygon gets extruded
ExtrudeHeight: Extrude distance when using the Fixed extrude mode
